content.raw: It would be nice if a new XML element was added to the model.config files used in the model database. Instead of requiring just the <sdf></sdf> tag, also include a <urdf></urdf> that can instead optionally be used if a URDF is being specified. This is a simple semantic thing, but helps clarify the confusing status of URDF in Gazebo. Note: this <urdf> tag would not require a version attribute, unlike the sdf element.
